brief: Computes the element-wise arc tangent of a list or a single number. Returns a new list of floats (radians).

returns.brief: Values are in radians (typically in the range -PI/2 to PI/2).

errors: TCL_ERROR if the input list is not found or is not numeric.

brief: Computes the element-wise arc tangent of two lists. Returns a new list of floats (radians).

returns.brief: Values are in radians (typically in the range -PI to PI).

errors: TCL_ERROR if the input lists are not found or are not numeric.
